🌍1. Country

🌍 Country & Tax Configuration

Set up your country settings and tax rates for accurate calculations

🌍 Country & Tax Setup

Configure your country for automatic tax rates and currency formatting

📍 Select Your Country

Selected: Australia • Currency: AUD • Tax: GST 10%

⚙️ Configuration Details

Date:DD/MM/YYYY(12 September 2025)
Locale:en-AU
Time:DD/MM/YYYY

🧮 Tax Calculator

Total: $110.00

📊 Formatting Examples

Currency:$100.00→$110.00
Number:1,234,567.89
Date:12 September 2025
Percent:15%
⚡

Global Impact

This setting automatically applies across your entire PrepFlow system:

• Pricing uses GST at 10%• Currency displays in AUD• Dates follow Australia standards• COGS includes proper tax handling

🥕3. Ingredients

🥕 Ingredients Database

Populate your database with common kitchen ingredients and cost data

🥕

Ingredients Database

Populate your database with 300+ common kitchen ingredients including costs, units, and yield percentages

What you'll get:

  • ✓300+ common ingredients (vegetables, meats, dairy, spices)
  • ✓Realistic cost data for Australian suppliers
  • ✓Proper units (kg, g, L, mL, each, etc.)
  • ✓Yield percentages and waste factors
  • ✓Trim and peel waste calculations

This will take about 10-15 seconds to complete

🍲4. Recipes

🍲

Sample Recipes

Add sample recipes to get started with recipe management and COGS calculations

Sample recipes include:

  • ✓Classic dishes (Caesar Salad, Fish & Chips, Beef Burger)
  • ✓Proper ingredient quantities and units
  • ✓Yield calculations for different portion sizes
  • ✓Ready for COGS calculations and pricing
  • ✓Perfect examples for creating your own recipes

This will add several sample recipes to help you get started

📊 Optional: Test Data

Generate sample temperature data for testing and demonstration

📊

Test Data Generator

Generate 3 months of realistic temperature log data for testing and demonstration

Note: This will create thousands of temperature log entries across all your equipment for the past 3 months. Perfect for testing the analytics and monitoring features.
